xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 25 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <krinye> has quit 11:20 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 11:38 <sdumitriu> has quit 11:39 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 12:31 <ravigarg27> has quit 13:59 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 14:42 <BogdanVancea> has quit 15:21 <ravigarg27> has quit 15:37 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 15:42 <sdumitriu> Hey kushalkhandelwal 15:42 <sdumitriu> Did you find a place to stay? 15:42 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu 15:42 <kushalkhandelwal> Nopes :( 15:42 <sdumitriu> :( 15:42 <kushalkhandelwal> Came back home an Hour back 15:42 <kushalkhandelwal> tiring day 15:42 <kushalkhandelwal> :\\ 15:43 <kushalkhandelwal> I am out from morning 10 15:43 <kushalkhandelwal> I hate this city 15:43 <kushalkhandelwal> :\ 15:43 <sdumitriu> Then why are you in it? 15:43 <kushalkhandelwal> My parents are like come back home ! 15:43 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh, initially I had a plce 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> which got cancelled at last moment 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> Actually 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> It gets very hard to work at home 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> I came home after long time 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> and lots of functions and all 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> I told parents 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> I have work to do over summer 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> So they said 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> Go Mumbai 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> I had acoo over there 15:44 <sdumitriu> Yes, I know how that is, whenever I went to my parents I rarely had time to code 15:44 <kushalkhandelwal> Which got cancelled 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> They don't let me be on computer when they are awake 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> :P 15:45 <sdumitriu> Here, something to keep you busy: https://github.com/sdumitriu/frontend-tests/ 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> So currently I am at a sisters place but have to leave from here in 2 days 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh nice 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Let me check 15:46 <kushalkhandelwal> You made this over this weekend ? 15:46 <sdumitriu> No, they're old 15:47 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh you uploaded them recently 15:47 <sdumitriu> First commit is from 3 years ago, but I had them before 15:47 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice would try :) 15:47 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 15:47 <kushalkhandelwal> Downloading 15:48 <kushalkhandelwal> Can you wait for some time 15:48 <kushalkhandelwal> Let me switch to linux 15:48 <sdumitriu> Sure 15:48 <kushalkhandelwal> No point of cloning it here 15:48 <kushalkhandelwal> Wait 15:48 <kushalkhandelwal> brb 15:48 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 15:57 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 15:57 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, You use a laptop or a desktop ? 15:57 <sdumitriu> Laptop 15:57 <kushalkhandelwal> Do you face heating issues on laptop with linux ? 15:57 <sdumitriu> At home 15:57 <sdumitriu> A mac mini at the lab 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh nice :) 15:58 <sdumitriu> Not really 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> My laptop burns on linux :P 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Driver issues 15:58 <sdumitriu> Actually, all my previous laptops did have heating problems especially in the summer 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> I switched off the graphic card 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Still :\ 15:58 <sdumitriu> Yes, the graphics card is problematic 15:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Yeah 15:59 <kushalkhandelwal> Over here it i s 45 degrees 15:59 <sdumitriu> Did you ever eat http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cherimoya ? 15:59 <sdumitriu> I'm eating one for the first time and it's amazing 15:59 <kushalkhandelwal> Never 16:00 <kushalkhandelwal> I am not sure if we find it in India 16:00 <kushalkhandelwal> Is it that amazing ? 16:00 <kushalkhandelwal> Looks something very dry 16:00 <sdumitriu> Not at all, it's very juicy 16:00 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 16:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Now I am hungry 16:01 <sdumitriu> And it does deserve the "ice cream fruit" nickname 16:01 <sdumitriu> Oh, sorry 16:01 <sdumitriu> Didn't mean to make you hungry 16:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Ah its ok :D 16:01 <kushalkhandelwal> I would get something to eat too 16:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Hehe :D 16:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 16:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Ice cream fruit 16:02 <sdumitriu> It says it's grown in south Asia 16:02 <kushalkhandelwal> Initially it looked to me like 16:02 <kushalkhandelwal> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sugar-apple 16:03 <kushalkhandelwal> Look at description on wiki 16:03 <kushalkhandelwal> It matches 16:04 <sdumitriu> Yes, they're the same species 16:04 <sdumitriu> Annona cherimola versus Anonna squamosa 16:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 16:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh 16:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Sugar Apple is also good :D 16:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Cloning your repo 16:07 <kushalkhandelwal> Would take some time to build 16:09 <kushalkhandelwal> Connection time out :( 16:11 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, You still there ? :P 16:11 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:11 <sdumitriu> Try again 16:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 16:12 <kushalkhandelwal> doing that 16:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Why I am getting a timeout 16:13 <sdumitriu> At what point? 16:13 <sdumitriu> Clongin or building? 16:14 <kushalkhandelwal> building 16:14 <kushalkhandelwal> INFO: I/O exception (java.net.ConnectException) caught when processing request: Connection timed out 16:14 <kushalkhandelwal> 26 May, 2013 1:44:21 AM org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodDirector executeWithRetry 16:14 <kushalkhandelwal> INFO: Retrying request 16:14 <kushalkhandelwal> Its not able to connect 16:14 <kushalkhandelwal> connect exception 16:14 <sdumitriu> Where is it trying to connect? 16:15 <sdumitriu> pastebin the console output 16:15 <kushalkhandelwal> Scanning for projects... 16:15 <kushalkhandelwal> Downloading: http://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/org/xwiki/commons/xwiki-commons-pom/5.0.1/xwiki-commons-pom-5.0.1.pom 16:15 <kushalkhandelwal> 26 May, 2013 1:44:21 AM org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodDirector executeWithRetry 16:15 <kushalkhandelwal> Thats all 16:15 <sdumitriu> Hm... 16:15 <sdumitriu> Let's try something different 16:15 <kushalkhandelwal> And my net is working good today :P 16:16 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 16:16 <sdumitriu> Open the pom.xml of phenotips and the one of the frontent-tests 16:16 <kushalkhandelwal> Opened 16:16 <sdumitriu> Copy the <repositories> and <pluginRepositories> settings 16:19 <kushalkhandelwal> Copied 16:19 <sdumitriu> Try again to build 16:19 <sdumitriu> It should download from nexus.cs.toronto.edu instead of maven central 16:20 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 16:23 <kushalkhandelwal> Same error 16:23 <kushalkhandelwal> I checked my connection 16:23 <kushalkhandelwal> proxy is not set 16:24 <sdumitriu> Can you open the link in a browser? 16:25 <kushalkhandelwal> No 16:25 <kushalkhandelwal> Item not found 16:25 <kushalkhandelwal> http://nexus.cs.toronto.edu/nexus/content/repositories/releases/org/xwiki/commons/xwiki-commons-pom/5.0.1/xwiki-commons-pom-5.0.1.pom 16:25 <kushalkhandelwal> try opening it 16:25 <sdumitriu> Hm, doesn't work for me either 16:25 <sdumitriu> Ah, but that's normal 16:26 <sdumitriu> It should then try this one: http://nexus.cs.toronto.edu/nexus/content/groups/public/org/xwiki/commons/xwiki-commons-pom/5.0.1/xwiki-commons-pom-5.0.1.pom 16:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 16:27 <kushalkhandelwal> This works 16:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Its not able to connect mostly 16:29 <kushalkhandelwal> java.net.ConnectException 16:29 <sdumitriu> Does it download stuff, though? 16:30 <sdumitriu> Keep trying, maybe there's a limit on the number of connections 16:30 <kushalkhandelwal> It is the initial thing 16:30 <kushalkhandelwal> on start only 16:30 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 16:30 <kushalkhandelwal> I am trying 16:30 <kushalkhandelwal> it keeps on retrying 16:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Now it is trying with other link 16:33 <kushalkhandelwal> And the same error 16:34 <sdumitriu> Are you sure you're not supposed to set a proxy? 16:36 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 16:36 <kushalkhandelwal> Proxy at uni 16:36 <kushalkhandelwal> I am using mobile broadband 16:38 <sdumitriu> Maybe it does use a proxy... 16:38 <sdumitriu> When it shouldn't 16:38 <sdumitriu> Did you change anything in ~/.m2/settings.xml? 16:39 <sdumitriu> Or I can give you the XAR 16:39 <sdumitriu> Just have an XWiki instance ready 16:43 <kushalkhandelwal> No 16:43 <kushalkhandelwal> I didnt change 16:43 <kushalkhandelwal> proxy is set to false 16:43 <kushalkhandelwal> give me XAR 16:43 <kushalkhandelwal> XWiki instance from Phenotips would do? 16:43 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:45 <sdumitriu> Sent 16:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Received 16:45 <kushalkhandelwal> and downloaded 16:47 <kushalkhandelwal> How should i use the application ? 16:47 <kushalkhandelwal> from xwiki ? 16:49 <kushalkhandelwal> Imported the application 16:52 <sdumitriu> Go to http://localhost:8080/bin/Test/ 16:52 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 16:53 <kushalkhandelwal> So now it is working :) 16:59 <kushalkhandelwal> So tell 16:59 <kushalkhandelwal> So can I check 16:59 <kushalkhandelwal> If I did it correctly ? 17:00 <sdumitriu> You can export back the document and send it to me 17:00 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok :) 17:00 <sdumitriu> I guess you don't have a public IP, right? 17:00 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 17:01 <kushalkhandelwal> I have a public Ip 17:01 <sdumitriu> Oh, even better 17:01 <sdumitriu> http://www.whatismyip.com/ 17:01 <kushalkhandelwal> 141.101.98.12 17:02 <sdumitriu> Can't connect 17:02 <kushalkhandelwal> What error you get ? 17:02 <sdumitriu> Nothing, it just doesn't load 17:02 <sdumitriu> It stays in the "Connecting..." phase 17:02 <kushalkhandelwal> try this 17:02 <kushalkhandelwal> 1.39.125.164 17:08 <sdumitriu> Same 17:08 <sdumitriu> Maybe a firewall 17:08 <sdumitriu> Or are you using a router? 17:09 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 17:09 <kushalkhandelwal> No firewall 17:09 <kushalkhandelwal> my settings might block the connection 17:09 <kushalkhandelwal> No router 17:09 <kushalkhandelwal> A mobile modem 17:10 <kushalkhandelwal> What is your ip ? 17:10 <kushalkhandelwal> Are you able to ping me ? 17:10 <sdumitriu> Ping works 17:11 <kushalkhandelwal> I will try to ping you 17:11 <kushalkhandelwal> I dont have to change anything 17:11 <kushalkhandelwal> to make it available online ? 20:27 <sdumitriu> has quit 22:30 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit
